parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Pleasing, satisfactory, acceptable. From aresko; agreeable; by implication, fit.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To place (put) to, add; I do again. From pros and tithemi; to place additionally, i.e. Lay beside, annex, repeat.
From sun and lambano; to clasp, i.e. Seize; specially, to conceive; by implication, to aid.
Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(in the neutral plural) specially (by implication) the Passover week.
